parameters.name: storyLength
parameters.description: The length of the story in words.

parameters.name: storyElements
parameters.description: A list of characters, settings, and events to include in the story.

name: fibonacci
description: Calculate the Fibonacci sequence up to a given number.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number up to which to calculate the Fibonacci sequence.

name: weatherForecast
description: Get the weather forecast for a specific location.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which to get the weather forecast.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: The number of days for which to get the forecast.
